medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was noted to have a mass in the right lobe of her thyroid at age 27. A right hemithyroidectomy was performed at age 28. Ultrasonography at age 40 showed three nodules in the left lobe and scattered hypoechogenic foci in the thyroid parenchyma.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient underwent right hemithyroidectomy at age 28 due to a benign nodule diagnosed as micro-follicular adenoma. No significant past medical conditions were specified.
medical_history.family_history: Two of her children have congenital hypothyroidism and an inactivating PAX8 mutation.
